sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Package, ShoppingCart, Users, BarChart3, Settings, Plus, Search, Filter, TrendingUp, AlertTriangle, Eye, Edit, Trash2, Download, Upload, RefreshCw } from 'lucide-react'; import ProductModal from './components/ProductModal'; import SalesModal from './components/SalesModal'; function App() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('dashboard'); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('all'); const [isProductModalOpen, setIsProductModalOpen] = useState(false); const [isSalesModalOpen, setIsSalesModalOpen] = useState(false); const [editingProduct, setEditingProduct] = useState(null); // Sample data - in a real app, this would come from your database const [products, setProducts] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Men's Casual T-Shirt", category: "Clothing", sku: "CLO-001", barcode: "1234567890123", currentStock: 45, minStock: 10, costPrice: 15.00, sellingPrice: 29.99, supplier: "Fashion Wholesale Co.", lastUpdated: "2024-01-15" }, { id: 2, name: "Women's Summer Dress", category: "Clothing", sku: "CLO-002", barcode: "1234567890124", currentStock: 23, minStock: 8, costPrice: 25.00, sellingPrice: 49.99, supplier: "Fashion Wholesale Co.", lastUpdated: "2024-01-14" }, { id: 3, name: "Chanel N°5 Perfume", category: "Perfume", sku: "PER-001", barcode: "1234567890125", currentStock: 12, minStock: 5, costPrice: 45.00, sellingPrice: 89.99, supplier: "Perfume Distributors Inc.", lastUpdated: "2024-01-13" }, { id: 4, name: "Dior Sauvage Eau de Toilette", category: "Perfume", sku: "PER-002", barcode: "1234567890126", currentStock: 8, minStock: 5, costPrice: 35.00, sellingPrice: 69.99, supplier: "Perfume Distributors Inc.", lastUpdated: "2024-01-12" }, { id: 5, name: "Leather Handbag", category: "Accessories", sku: "ACC-001", barcode: "1234567890127", currentStock: 15, minStock: 6, costPrice: 30.00, sellingPrice: 59.99, supplier: "Accessory World", lastUpdated: "2024-01-11" } ]); const [recentSales, setRecentSales] = useState([ { id: 1, product: "Men's Casual T-Shirt", quantity: 2, total: 59.98, date: "2024-01-15" }, { id: 2, product: "Chanel N°5 Perfume", quantity: 1, total: 89.99, date: "2024-01-15" }, { id: 3, product: "Women's Summer Dress", quantity: 1, total: 49.99, date: "2024-01-14" }, { id: 4, product: "Leather Handbag", quantity: 1, total: 59.99, date: "2024-01-14" } ]); const categories = ['all', 'Clothing', 'Perfume', 'Accessories']; const filteredProducts = products.filter(product => { const matchesSearch = product.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || product.sku.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || product.barcode.includes(searchTerm); const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === 'all' || product.category === selectedCategory; return matchesSearch && matchesCategory; }); const lowStockProducts = products.filter(product => product.currentStock <= product.minStock); const totalProducts = products.length; const totalValue = products.reduce((sum, product) => sum + (product.currentStock * product.costPrice), 0); const totalSales = recentSales.reduce((sum, sale) => sum + sale.total, 0); const handleAddProduct = (productData) => { const newProduct = { ...productData, id: Date.now(), lastUpdated: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] }; setProducts([...products, newProduct]); }; const handleEditProduct = (productData) => { setProducts(products.map(p => p.id === editingProduct.id ? { ...productData, id: p.id, lastUpdated: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] } : p )); setEditingProduct(null); }; const handleDeleteProduct = (productId) => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this product?')) { setProducts(products.filter(p => p.id !== productId)); } }; const handleSaveProduct = (productData) => { if (editingProduct) { handleEditProduct(productData); } else { handleAddProduct(productData); } }; const handleSaveSale = (saleData) => { const newSale = { id: Date.now(), product: saleData.products.map(p => p.name).join(', '), quantity: saleData.products.reduce((sum, p) => sum + p.quantity, 0), total: saleData.total, date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] }; setRecentSales([newSale, ...recentSales]); // Update product stock const updatedProducts = products.map(product => { const soldProduct = saleData.products.find(p => p.id === product.id); if (soldProduct) { return { ...product, currentStock: product.currentStock - soldProduct.quantity, lastUpdated: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] }; } return product; }); setProducts(updatedProducts); }; const openEditProduct = (product) => { setEditingProduct(product); setIsProductModalOpen(true); }; const closeProductModal = () => { setIsProductModalOpen(false); setEditingProduct(null); }; const renderDashboard = () => (
{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Products

{totalProducts}

Total Value

${totalValue.toFixed(2)}

Low Stock Items

{lowStockProducts.length}

Today's Sales

${totalSales.toFixed(2)}

{/* Recent Sales and Low Stock Alerts */}

Recent Sales

{recentSales.slice(0, 5).map(sale => (

{sale.product}

Qty: {sale.quantity} • {sale.date}

${sale.total}

))}

Low Stock Alerts

{lowStockProducts.map(product => (

{product.name}

Stock: {product.currentStock} (Min: {product.minStock})

))}
); const renderInventory = () => (
{/* Search and Filters */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500" />
{/* Products Table */}

Inventory ({filteredProducts.length} products)

{filteredProducts.map(product => ( ))}
Product Category SKU Stock Cost Price Selling Price Actions
{product.name}
{product.barcode}
 {product.category} {product.sku}
{product.currentStock} {product.currentStock <= product.minStock && ( )}
${product.costPrice} ${product.sellingPrice}
); const renderSales = () => (

Sales Management

Today's Sales

${totalSales.toFixed(2)}

Items Sold Today

{recentSales.reduce((sum, sale) => sum + sale.quantity, 0)}

Average Order Value

${(totalSales / recentSales.length).toFixed(2)}

Recent Sales

{recentSales.map(sale => ( ))}
Sale ID Product Quantity Total Date Status
#{sale.id} {sale.product} {sale.quantity} ${sale.total} {sale.date} Completed
); const renderCustomers = () => (

Customer Management

No customers yet

Get started by adding your first customer.

); const renderAnalytics = () => (

Analytics Dashboard

Total Revenue

${totalSales.toFixed(2)}

This month

Products Sold

{recentSales.reduce((sum, sale) => sum + sale.quantity, 0)}

This month

Average Order

${(totalSales / recentSales.length).toFixed(2)}

Per transaction

Low Stock Items

{lowStockProducts.length}

Need attention

Analytics coming soon

Detailed charts and insights will be available here.

); const renderSettings = () => (

System Settings

Store Information

System Preferences

); return (
{/* Header */}

Stock Management System

A
{/* Navigation */}
{[ { id: 'dashboard', name: 'Dashboard', icon: BarChart3 }, { id: 'inventory', name: 'Inventory', icon: Package }, { id: 'sales', name: 'Sales', icon: ShoppingCart }, { id: 'customers', name: 'Customers', icon: Users }, { id: 'analytics', name: 'Analytics', icon: TrendingUp }, { id: 'settings', name: 'Settings', icon: Settings } ].map(tab => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Main Content */}
{activeTab === 'dashboard' && renderDashboard()} {activeTab === 'inventory' && renderInventory()} {activeTab === 'sales' && renderSales()} {activeTab === 'customers' && renderCustomers()} {activeTab === 'analytics' && renderAnalytics()} {activeTab === 'settings' && renderSettings()}
{/* Modals */} setIsSalesModalOpen(false)} products={products} onSave={handleSaveSale} />
); } export default App;
